text: White People is a 1991 short story collection by author Allan Gurganus. ==Overview== A collection of eleven short stories about people white and not white from the modern Southern United States. ==References== Category:English- language novels Category:Novels about race and ethnicity Category:Works about White Americans Category:1991 short story collections Category:Single-writer short story collections Category:American short story collections Category:Alfred A. Knopf books Category:PEN/Faulkner Award for Fiction-winning works Category:Southern United States in fiction
title: White People (short story collection)
